General.Name: LH Hotel Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: LH Hotel Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust operates as a real estate investment trust in Thailand. It is involved in the rental of immovable properties. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
